titleNullable: Hacker News: All Posts, Stories, Ask/Show HN, etc
subtitleNullable: All posts since 2006 (+3.3M), without including comments.
descriptionNullable:
I used [Algolia's API](https://hn.algolia.com/api) to download the posts. I wrote a [thin Python wrapper](https://github.com/santiagobasulto/python-hacker-news) around it that made it very simple to download them (and keep them updated).

Check the full library if you're interested in your own downloads: [https://github.com/santiagobasulto/python-hacker-news](https://github.com/santiagobasulto/python-hacker-news).
